title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: American Airlines says AI could help with fares — but only to save time
items.description: American Airlines is considering using artificial intelligence to help automate the process of filing millions of daily fares.

items.title: 6 lesser-known Chase Sapphire Reserve benefits that pay off big
items.description: You've likely heard about the Chase Sapphire Reserve's $300 annual travel credit, but here are six lesser-known perks you might not have known about.

items.title: Another great KLM business-class flight with a last-minute mileage deal — and you can book it, too
items.description: A review of KLM's Dreamliner from Amsterdam to New York in business class, booked using Flying Blue miles at a great price.

items.title: Amex introduces Centurion Lounge wait times as part of all-new travel app
items.description: American Express is debuting an all-new dedicated mobile travel app, dubbed the Amex Travel App.

items.title: Ink Business Unlimited Credit Card review: Best ever welcome offer and no annual fee
items.description: The Ink Business Unlimited Credit Card is an excellent choice for business owners looking to maximize rewards they earn on business purchases.
